Description: Lip and wall sherd of Attic red-figured or black-glazed pottery type C cup; glazed black on interior and exterior (misfired brown to red in places); offset lip and sharp carination to shoulder; inscription cut on exterior.
Curator's comments: Cups type C are attested before 510BC in destruction levels at Sybaris, see E. Greco, 'Sullo σχῆμα di Thurii: venti anni di ricerche con Silvana Luppino', Annuario della Scuola archeologica di Atene e delle Missioni italiane in Oriente XCII (Serie III, 14) (2014) [2016], 1-11, esp. 5.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 22.2.4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0662) (Phase 1)
